name: Advanced Notifications
author: Yehi

sections.description:
Advanced Notifications allows you to create beautiful custom notifications that appear on pages or posts of your choice.

Demos – Advanced Notifications – Live Preview

In development:

  • More designs
  • More animations

Features:

Here’s a list of the Basic version features in plain text format:

Notifications

  • Number of Notifications: Unlimited
  • Types: Editor, Image, HTML
  • Notification by User Role Types: Always all users & visitors, All users & visitors
  • Scheduled Notification: No
  • Notification by Devices Types: All devices, Desktop, Desktop & Tablet, Tablet, Only Tablet & Mobile, Mobile
  • Delay Before Show: Yes
  • Show Time: Yes
  • Publish Type: All site pages, Custom post types & taxonomies, Only on specific pages
  • Limiting the Number of Shows per Period: Yes
  • Animations In & Out: Basic
  • APIs for Developers: Yes

Locations

  • Number of Locations: Unlimited
  • Locations: Bottom & Left, Bottom & Right, Top & Left, Top & Right
  • Custom Location Options: Basic
  • Responsive: Yes

Designs

  • Number of Designs: Unlimited
  • Designs: Default, Success, Info, Warning
  • Custom Design Options: Basic
  • Responsive: Yes

Triggers

  • Number of Triggers: Unlimited
  • Number of Triggers per Notification: Only one
  • Notifications Mode: Page is loaded and in triggers
  • Triggers: Mouse leave from top, On click, On hover
  • Trigger Action: Only show notification

Full Features – Advanced Notifications – Features

Feedback

If you like this plugin, then please leave us a good rating and review.
Advanced Notifications – Reviews
sections.installation: Upload the Advanced Notifications plugin to your plugin folder on your site, Activate it.
sections.changelog:
1.2.5

  • Improvement: js & css

1.2.4

  • Add: Triggers – New feature! Displays the notifications in custom triggers
  • Add: New designs options
  • Add: New locations for multilingual sites
  • Update: eis plugin
  • Fix: Turn off all notification on a specific page
  • Fix: Background image on custom design
  • Improvement: compatibility with PHP 8.1 version

1.2.0

  • Update: eis plugin

1.1.9

  • Improvement: compatibility with PHP 8.1 version

1.1.7

  • Update: eis plugin

1.1.6

  • Add: notification preview

1.1.5

  • Improvement: Specific pages settings for notification

1.1.4

  • Improvement: Improved notification table, more information
  • Add: Option to duplicate notification, design and location

1.1.3

  • Fix: JS error

1.1.2

  • Fix: File name error
  • Update: eis plugin

1.1.1

  • Improvement: Changing the way the notification is limited so that it also works in cache mode

1.1.0

  • Fix: PHP errors

1.0.9

  • Fix: PHP Warnings

1.0.8

  • Update: eis plugin
  • Fix: PHP errors

1.0.7

  • update: Support for more plugins 3rd party

1.0.6

  • Update: eis plugin

1.0.5

  • Release Date – 21 November 2021*
  • Add: to API custom class for location and notification
  • Improvement: default css style
  • Fix: none notifications php notice

1.0.4

  • Release Date – 18 November 2021*
  • Add: Shortcode support

1.0.3

  • Release Date – 03 November 2021 – Hello World *
